Manual Pages

The Ejscript distribution provides manual pages that can be viewed (on Unix-like systems) using the systems man command. Text copies of the pages are included below:

Topic Description
ejs Ejscript shell
ejsc Ejscript compiler
ejsmod Ejscript module manager
mvc Ejscript Web Framework application generator
